title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 15 - Collateral Loan Brokers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 15 - Collateral Loan Brokers

State Regulations
§ 15.1 - Books and records to be maintained by collateral loan brokers
§ 15.2 - Information to be contained in books and records
§ 15.3 - Collateral loan broker's report of auction sale
§ 15.4 - Collateral loan broker's notice to pledgor-six months after date of pledge
§ 15.5 - Collateral loan broker's notice to pledgor of existing surplus from auction sale
§ 15.6 - Pledgor's receipt for surplus
§ 15.7 - Collateral loan broker's registration and supplemental registration statement
§ 15.8 - Lawful extra care charges

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 15

Statutory authority: General Business Law, art. 5; Abandoned

Property Law, §§1301, 1414

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
